title: The Bushman goes home
creator_credit: Eric Bedford and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: A cattle station owner makes the long journey from his vast cattle station on the Gulf of Carpentaria to visit Melbourne and the cattle saleyards. He then flies back via the cattle fattening plains of New South Wales. Narrated by Nigel Lovell.
creator_credit_for_label: Eric Bedford and Australian National Film Board
